${alias}.UNIT_BIDDING_ID unitBiddingId, ${alias}.PROJ_PURCHASE_ID projPurchaseId, ${alias}.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, ${alias}.IS_WON_BID isWonBid, ${alias}.AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag, ${alias}.IS_DELETE isDelete, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, ${alias}.MEMO memo, ${alias}.UNIT_SERVICE_ID unitServiceId, ${alias}.BIDDING_TIME biddingTime, ${alias}.IS_CANCEL_SIGNUP isCancelSignup, ${alias}.IS_UPLOAD_CONTRACT isUploadContract, ${alias}.IS_UPLOAD_RESULT isUploadResult, ${alias}.IS_EVALUATE isEvaluate, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_IM_UNIT_BIDDING( UNIT_BIDDING_ID ,PROJ_PURCHASE_ID ,UNIT_INFO_ID , IS_WON_BID ,AUDIT_FLAG ,IS_DELETE ,CREATER , CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFY_TIME ,LINKMAN_INFO_ID , MEMO ,UNIT_SERVICE_ID,IS_CANCEL_SIGNUP,IS_UPLOAD_CONTRACT,IS_UPLOAD_RESULT,IS_EVALUATE,ROOT_ORG_ID ) values ( #{unitBiddingId},#{projPurchaseId},#{unitInfoId}, #{isWonBid},#{auditFlag},#{isDelete},#{creater}, #{createTime},#{modifier},#{modifyTime},#{linkmanInfoId}, #{memo},#{unitServiceId},#{isCancelSignup},#{isUploadContract},#{isUploadResult},#{isEvaluate},#{rootOrgId} )
mapper.update:
update AEA_IM_UNIT_BIDDING
UNIT_BIDDING_ID = #{unitBiddingId},
PROJ_PURCHASE_ID = #{projPurchaseId},
UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId},
IS_WON_BID = #{isWonBid},
AUDIT_FLAG = #{auditFlag},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{linkmanInfoId},
MEMO = #{memo},
UNIT_SERVICE_ID = #{unitServiceId},
BIDDING_TIME = #{biddingTime},
IS_CANCEL_SIGNUP = #{isCancelSignup},
IS_UPLOAD_CONTRACT = #{isUploadContract},
IS_UPLOAD_RESULT = #{isUploadResult},
IS_EVALUATE = #{isEvaluate},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where UNIT_BIDDING_ID = #{unitBiddingId}
mapper.select: SELECT api.proj_name projName, aipp.proj_service_id projServiceId FROM AEA_IM_UNIT_BIDDING aiub LEFT JOIN aea_im_proj_purchase aipp ON aipp.proj_service_id = aiub.proj_service_id LEFT JOIN aea_proj_info api ON api.proj_info_id = aipp.proj_info_id

SELECT AVG(aise.COMP_EVALUATION) compEvaluation FROM aea_im_unit_bidding aiub LEFT JOIN aea_im_service_evaluation aise on aise.UNIT_BIDDING_ID = aiub.UNIT_BIDDING_ID WHERE aiub.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aise.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aiub.IS_WON_BID = '1' AND aiub.IS_CANCEL_SIGNUP = '0' AND aise.AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND aiub.UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId} GROUP BY aiub.UNIT_INFO_ID

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM aea_im_unit_bidding aiub LEFT JOIN aea_im_proj_purchase aipp ON aiub.PROJ_PURCHASE_ID = aipp.PROJ_PURCHASE_ID WHERE aiub.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aiub.IS_CANCEL_SIGNUP = '0'
AND aiub.IS_WON_BID = '1' AND aipp.AUDIT_FLAG != '10'
AND aiub.IS_WON_BID = '1' AND aiub.IS_UPLOAD_CONTRACT = '1' AND aipp.AUDIT_FLAG != '10'
AND aiub.IS_WON_BID = '1' AND aiub.IS_UPLOAD_CONTRACT = '1' AND aipp.AUDIT_FLAG = '1'
AND aiub.UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId}

SELECT aiub.UNIT_BIDDING_ID unitBiddingId, ali.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, ali.LINKMAN_MAIL linkmanMail, ali.LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE linkmanMobilePhone FROM aea_im_unit_bidding aiub LEFT JOIN aea_linkman_info ali ON aiub.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = ali.LINKMAN_INFO_ID WHERE aiub.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aiub.UNIT_BIDDING_ID = #{unitBiddingId}

select
, aui.APPLICANT from AEA_IM_UNIT_BIDDING aiub,aea_unit_info aui
aiub.UNIT_INFO_ID = aui.UNIT_INFO_ID
AND PROJ_PURCHASE_ID = #{projPurchaseId}
AND IS_DELETE = '0'
